scopes.create: Create new albums, channels, and so on
scopes.delete: Delete videos, albums, channels, and so on
scopes.edit: Edit existing videos, albums, channels, and so on
scopes.interact: Interact with Vimeo resources on a member's behalf, such as liking a video or following another member
scopes.promo_codes: Add, remove, and review Vimeo On Demand promotions
scopes.purchased: Access a member's Vimeo On Demand purchase history
scopes.scim: Manage users and team groups via the SCIM protocol
scopes.video_files: Access video files belonging to members with a PRO subscription or higher

apiDescription: Build something great. Vimeo's API supports flexible, high-quality video integration with your custom apps.
